00149             function                delete( &$Options )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         $Provider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00154                         $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'delete_func' , 'delete' );
00155                         $Ids = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_posted_ids( $this->Prefix );
00156                         
00157                         if( method_exists( $Provider , $FunctionName ) === true )
00158                         {
00159                               call_user_func( array( $Provider , $FunctionName ) , implode( ',' , $Ids ) , $Options );
00160                         }
00161                         else
00162                         {
00163                               $ClassName = $Provider ? get_class( $Provider ) : 'undefined_class';
00164                               throw( new Exception( "Method \"$FunctionName\" was not found in the class \"$ClassName.\"" ) );
00165                         }
00166                   }
00167                   catch( Exception $e )
00168                   {
00169                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00170                   }
00171             }

00191             function                multy_call( &$Options )
00192             {
00193                   try
00194                   {
00195                         $Ids = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_posted_ids( $this->Prefix );
00196                         $Provider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00197 
00198                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'id_list_accept' , 1 ) == '1' )
00199                         {
00200                               call_user_func( 
00201                                     array( $Provider , $Options->get_setting( 'func_name' ) ) , implode( $Ids ) , $Options
00202                               );
00203                         }
00204                         else
00205                         {
00206                               foreach( $Ids as $id )
00207                               {
00208                                     call_user_func( array( $Provider , $Options->get_setting( 'func_name' ) ) , $id , $Options );
00209                               }
00210                         }
00211                   }
00212                   catch( Exception $e )
00213                   {
00214                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00215                   }
00216             }

00236             function                create( &$Options )
00237             {
00238                   try
00239                   {
00240                         $ExtractionScript = $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_extraction_script' );
00241                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ExtractionScript );
00242                         $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'create_func' , 'create' );
00243                         
00244                         $Provider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00245 
00246                         if( method_exists( $Provider , $FunctionName ) === true )
00247                         {
00248                               $id = call_user_func( array( $Provider , $FunctionName ) , $Record , $Options );
00249                               $this->GUI->set_var( 'record_id' , $id );
00250                         }
00251                         else
00252                         {
00253                               $ClassName = $Provider ? get_class( $Provider ) : 'undefined_class';
00254                               throw( new Exception( "Method \"$FunctionName\" was not found in the class \"$ClassName.\"" ) );
00255                         }
00256                   }
00257                   catch( Exception $e )
00258                   {
00259                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00260                   }
00261             }

00319             function                get_update_record( $Options , $Ids )
00320             {
00321                   try
00322                   {
00323                         $GetPostValidation = $Options->get_setting( 'get_post_validation' , false );
00324                         $ValidationScript = $Options->get_setting( 'custom_get_post_validation' , $GetPostValidation );
00325                         
00326                         if( $ValidationScript === false )
00327                         {
00328                               throw( new Exception( 'There is no script to extract data from http headers' ) );
00329                         }
00330                         $RecordNew = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ValidationScript );
00331 
00332                         $UpdateRecord = array();
00333                         foreach( $RecordNew as $Field => $NewValue )
00334                         {
00335                               $Field = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $Field );
00336                               
00337                               if( @$RecordOriginal->$Field != $NewValue )
00338                               {
00339                                     @$UpdateRecord[ $Field ] = $NewValue;
00340                               }
00341                         }
00342                         
00343                         return( $UpdateRecord );
00344                   }
00345                   catch( Exception $e )
00346                   {
00347                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00348                   }
00349             }
00350             
00369             function                update( &$Options )
00370             {
00371                   try
00372                   {
00373                         $Ids = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_posted_ids( $this->Prefix );
00374                         
00377                         $RecordOriginal = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $Ids );
00378                         
00379                         $UpdateRecord = $this->get_update_record( $Options , $Ids );
00380                         
00381                         $Provider = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_provider( $Options , $this->Provider );
00382                         $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'update_func' , 'update' );
00383                         if( method_exists( $Provider , $FunctionName ) === true )
00384                         {
00385                               call_user_func(
00386                                     array( $Provider , $FunctionName ) , implode( ',' , $Ids ) , $UpdateRecord , $Options
00387                               );
00388                         }
00389                         else
00390                         {
00391                               $ClassName = $Provider ? get_class( $Provider ) : 'undefined_class';
00392                               throw( new Exception( "Method \"$FunctionName\" was not found in the class \"$ClassName.\"" ) );
00393                         }
00394                   }
00395                   catch( Exception $e )
00396                   {
00397                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00398                   }
00399             }
